response_created: The custom command for the specified position with name **{{position}}** was successfully created with the command `/{{command}}`.
response_changed: The custom command for the specified position with name **{{position}}** was successfully changed from `/{{oldCommand}}` to `/{{newCommand}}`.
response_removed: The custom command for the specified position with name **{{position}}** was successfully removed.
response_nothing_to_remove: The specified position **{{position}}** has no existing custom command to remove.
response_failed: The custom command `/{{command}}` was unable to be created, likely because the name was invalid for a slash command.
